content: Hey MarekM 3498 I checked the log and

author: parithosh
content:
<@&688101493978562687> looks like lh-erigon-1 on devnet-8 is stuck on an invalid block:
```
[WARN] [09-25|09:47:04.679] [4/12 Execution] Execution failed        block=172775 hash=0x737584f09b36b240ee9e7732b972757812e8ae0668116caab84855cfc6bff39c err="invalid block: could not apply tx 0 from block 172775 [0x860c15a8dd1667e8c0fe2fa3cf02fc4c560d1ce753c86e8d229efe924db78dd8]: nonce too high: address 0xAD01b55d7c3448B8899862eb335FBb17075d8DE2, tx: 111975 state: 111972"
```

The block hash for said block (172772) seems to differ from lh-erigon vs other erigon nodes or other nodes in general, so im not sure why lh-erigon got stuck on that head. afaik it should have re-orged onto the other, valid block and continued onwards. 

https://forkmon.dencun-devnet-8.ethpandaops.io/

author: parithosh
content:
<@792822129019584562> lh-ethereumJS also seems stuck with:
```
[09-25|09:53:33] INFO [ CL ] Imported skeleton blocks count=100 first=243961 last=243862 hash=0x94cf…e3f3 peers=3
[09-25|09:53:33] DEBUG [ CL ] Starting canonical chain fill canonicalHead=243861 subchainHead=249051
[09-25|09:53:33] ERROR [ CL ] fillCanonicalChain putBlock error=Block number 243862 not found in DB
[09-25|09:53:33] ERROR [ CL ] Failed to put block number=243862 fork=cancun hash=0xa7a1…a6c3 parentHash=0x5906…0b42from skeleton chain
```
its also stuck on a block hash the others don't seem to be on.

Also nimbus/teku/prysm/lh-ethereumJS are all stuck. So probably an ethereumJS issue? only lodestar-ethereumJS seems healthy. Should i pull a new image or something?

author: sproul
content:
we've pushed devnet-9 changes to our `deneb-free-blobs` branch, and the resulting `:deneb` image now includes this code

would it be helpful to have a `deneb-devnet-8` image too for backwards compatibility, or can we just avoid updating the Lighthouse nodes?

author: parithosh
content:
we can just avoid updating lighthouse nodes, we're using pinned commit images anyway (e.g: ` ethpandaops/lighthouse:devnet8-39853b4`) so if there's ever a fix we can work off a smaller feature branch.

We'll use `deneb-free-blobs` for devnet-9, thanks!

author: parithosh
content: <@827653956955406406> fyi, had to restart lh-besu, nimbus-besu and prysm-besu presumibly stuck due to the earlier found memleak. They seem fine post reboot.

author: tersec
content: as a general note, `nimbus-eth2` `unstable` is also on a devnet-9 spec release. if it becomes necessary to add/backport some specific fix, can do that

author: parithosh
content:
Creating a thread to gather images to be used in devnet-9:
Specs found here: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/dencun-devnet-9

Please post a comment with which images we should deploy. 

TLDR changes: 
- All the newly included EIPs
- No hardcoded 4788 address, we will be submitting a transaction before deneb (which address do we settle on<@543900561460822016>, one from previous testnets or the one that will be used in mainnet?)
- Capella genesis
- Testnet goes up once hive looks okay-ish, DM to update hive configs
